## Description {#details}

A reference to a register write.

This class is mainly used by the register file to describe register mappings. It correlates a register write to the source index of the defining instruction.

Definition at line 38 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/include/llvm/mca/hardwareunits/registerfile-h">RegisterFile.h</a>.
